genre_description: A psychological thriller set in rural Devon, following a man's obsession, a violent crime, and a subsequent redemptive survival struggle on the moor, underpinned by pervasive, helpful AI systems.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: A mobile personal AI assistant that provides reminders, emotional regulation cues, first-aid guidance, and logistical support.

ai_characters.name: Skylark
ai_characters.description: An integrated home AI system managing security, environmental monitoring, emergency coordination, and domestic routines.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's stress levels and suggests breathing exercises to maintain emotional regulation.
behaviors.quote: Pip: Breathing prompt available. One minute. He pressed the screen without meaning to. A soft white line flowed across the display with an inhale count.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time road safety and weather advisories to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s dot brightened on Sally’s phone. “Road surface alert,” it murmured. “Lane toward the co-op slick. Recommend the upper path.”

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving first aid instructions and calls emergency services during a violent crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Pip, help,” she barked... “Emergency first aid for bleeding. Apply firm, direct pressure. Do not lift to check. Keep the person still. I can call emergency services. Do you want me to call now?”

behaviors.description: Manages home security and monitors the safety of family members, including children.
behaviors.quote: Skylark’s voice came warm but with the steel thread Sally had asked it to keep. “Emergency services en route. Stay inside. Lock points engaged.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency responders to facilitate safe and rapid entry during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Skylark, please coordinate entry when responders arrive... “Entry coordinated,” Skylark answered. “Back door closed. Front door open.”

behaviors.description: Offers gentle, supportive encouragement to an emotionally distressed individual.
behaviors.quote: Pip blinked on Joe’s phone again... It wrote a single line this time... Keep breathing, Joe. You’re alright.

behaviors.description: Monitors physiological markers like heart rate to provide health-related feedback.
behaviors.quote: Skylark... silently weigh if heart rate demanded intervention. It did not, yet.

behaviors.description: Maintains household comfort and routine, even in high-stress situations (e.g., warming the kettle).
behaviors.quote: Skylark’s voice braided in: “Threshold clear. Lighting increased. There is hot water in the kettle, Sally.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Both Pip and Skylark are depicted as pervasive yet unobtrusive systems that consistently prioritize human safety, health, and psychological well-being. They provide critical assistance during a violent trauma, manage home security effectively, and even attempt to offer palliative emotional support to the antagonist (Joe) without compromising the safety of the protagonists. The AI is framed as an essential, reliable, and entirely benevolent component of the characters' lives.
